name: event
description:
Template designed for events. Use it for conferences, seminars, concerts...

The template features a unique and slick design and integrates well with your brand logo. Use it to give informations about an event: map, schedule, directory, about page and news. Populate the photo and video gallery with pictures taken live during the event.

The template expects precise datasource types for each view. Please ensure that the datasource feed you set matches the expected type. Use an ical datasource for the schedule and a Twitter feed for the comments view for instance.

news.title: News
news.description: Latest news concerning the event, e.g. a blog or other RSS content

tweets.title: Comments
tweets.description: Comments on social networks, e.g. tweets from an hashtag

calendar.title: Schedule
calendar.description: What is happening and when? An ical datasource, e.g. a Google Calendar

speakers.title: Speakers
speakers.description: List of speakers, artists, sponsors or companies you want to feature, typically defined in a spreadsheets (using the standard format)

photos.title: Photos
photos.description: Live pictures taken during the event

videos.title: Videos
videos.description: Recording of the event. Suggestion: create an empty playlist filled during/after the event.
